divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife were sitting in our living room and noticed four bright disc shaped objects in the night sky, they were yellow in color, one went out and then back on just once,then after a few minutes they just diapered. We found this site very odd as we had never seen these large lights before.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Freedom
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I saw four round yellow lights in the sky one went off and back on then all disappeared
